description.ruby-sapphire:
Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.
description.emerald:
Exhales a hot breath on the
foe. May inflict a burn.
description.firered-leafgreen:
The user exhales a
heated breath to
attack. It may also
inflict a burn.
description.diamond-pearl:
The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.
description.platinum:
The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.
description.heartgold-soulsilver:
The user exhales a
heated breath on the
foe to attack. It may
also leave the target
with a burn.
description.black-white:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing team. It may also leave
targets with a burn.
description.black-2-white-2:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing team. It may also leave
targets with a burn.
description.x-y:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
those Pokémon with a burn.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath
on the opposing Pokémon. This may also leave
those Pokémon with a burn.
description.sun-moon:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on the
opposing Pokémon. This may also leave those
Pokémon with a burn.
description.sword-shield:
The user attacks by exhaling hot breath on opposing
Pokémon. This may also leave those Pokémon with
a burn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
effect.shortEffect: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn the target.
